etomica.atom

Class AtomSourceRandomLeaf

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.atom.AtomSourceRandomLeaf
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomSource, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomSourceRandomMonomer

    public class AtomSourceRandomLeaf
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomSource, java.io.Serializable
    AtomSource that returns a completely random leaf atom.
    See Also:
